plot: A glance in the mirror and the finding of an old coat that his father used to wear marks just the beginning of Pietro's realization that something new and turbulent is coming into his life.
title: Un pensiero kalasnikov
plot_es: A glance in the mirror and the finding of an old coat that his father used to wear marks just the beginning of Pietro's realization that something new and turbulent is coming into his life.
plot_en: A glance in the mirror and the finding of an old coat that his father used to wear marks just the beginning of Pietro's realization that something new and turbulent is coming into his life.
